# [Epic] Orchestration Canvas - Visual Workflow Builder

## Overview

Visual workflow builder where AI agents collaborate on automated pipelines.

## Stories

- [ ] ORB-042: Create Workflow data model
- [ ] ORB-043: Build visual workflow editor
- [ ] ORB-044: Implement workflow triggers
- [ ] ORB-045: Build workflow actions library

## Acceptance Criteria

- Drag-and-drop workflow canvas
- Connect triggers to actions
- Schedule, webhook, and event triggers
- Actions include posting, notifications, AI calls

## Dependencies

- Phase 2 AI agents

## Technical Notes

- New Prisma models: `Workflow`, `WorkflowStep`, `WorkflowTrigger`
- Visual editor using React Flow or similar
- Trigger execution engine (cron, webhook, event-based)
- Extensible action library
